[[inst_hl_ccat]]
==== HL.CCAT

*Syntax:* hl.ccat SrcL, SrcR, shamt, ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ccat.svg[HL.CCAT encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* ALU

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"alu_kind": "BARREL_CCAT", "note": "User confirmed A; double-output implemented as 2 ALU uops (macro_uid bound)", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["ALU", "ALU"], "uop_kind": "ALU"}`
